metadata.title: CVE-2017-15120 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue has been found in the parsing of authoritative answers in PowerDNSRecursor before 4.0.8, leading to a NULL pointer dereference when parsing aspecially crafted answer containing a CNAME of a different class than IN.An unauthenticated remote attacker could cause a denial of service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15120` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

pdns-recursor - 4.1.1-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pdns-recursor package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.1.1-2').
